resources.string:
"Welcome to a whole new way to scout robots! With this app, in addition to the Mac app located on team 4557's website, scouting robots is as easy as clicking a few buttons.
Please visit http://www.fullmetalfalcons.org to download the Mac application, and get started.
Email us at robotics@xavierhighschool.org with any questions. Below is more information on how to use this
Prior to downloading the Mac application, make sure your Mac is equipped with Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE). You can check this in System Information.
After installing and opening the Mac app, make sure Bluetooth is enabled on both this device and the computer. Thenâ€¦
1. Enter the same passkey on both the Mac and Phone apps and press the "refresh" buttons on both 2. After completing the form, press the "DONE" button at the bottom. On the Mac, when ready to get all the data, just press the "Compile to Excel" button. 3. And that's it! Scout away!"
